Html:
Hi,
I need to reome the back entry in the la last mvvm light version using the INavigationService
but in the interface I can implement only the methods GoBack and NavigateTo.
How I can solve this problem using the framework?

Bye
Daniele

Hi,

You are right, this feature is not available at the moment.

I would recommend declaring your own interface (which may or may not derive from INavigationService, as you wish) and implement the method yourself. I'll consider adding this feature in a future version.

Thanks for your input,
Laurent
Implement a custom NavigationService that receives a bool ClearBackstack parameter in each page configuration, checking it in the NavigateTo method implementation.

Hi Laurent,,

I was following your sample Flowers on Xamarin.Forms and was going through implementation of NavigationService.In my Xamarin.forms application , in one of my ViewModel I need to use PushModalAsync/PopModalAsync for navigation. But the current implementation of NavigationService only use PushAsync/PopAsync.

So how can I implement INavigationService in order to make use of PushModalAsync/PopModalAsync for navigation.

kpant
